awards:
第48届戛纳电影节(1995)
　　主竞赛单元 短片金棕榈奖(提名) 弗洛伦斯·汉娜德

writer.name: 弗洛伦斯·汉娜德 Florence Henrard

director.name: 弗洛伦斯·汉娜德 Florence Henrard

introduction: A father waits for his wife, a resigned housewife, to prepare dinner. He sends his daughter to take a bath. In spite of her unwillingness, she submits to it anyway, but astonishment! Once in the water, she grows breasts… She does not dare to reveal her transformed body to her parents’ eyes! However, this sudden metamorphosis rejoices her amazed father, as well as her mother who only has to entrust the tasks of the house to her daughter, now a woman, and leave her home and her ungrateful condition.
